00066 CNFamilialEngine * CNFamilialEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00067 {
00068     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == CNFamilialEngine::EngineName())
00069         return (CNFamilialEngine *)engine;
00070     return NULL;
00071 }

00090 /**
00091  * @brief Initialize the data and free any memory allocated.
00092  */
00093 void CNFamilialEngine::clear()
00094 {
00095     if (m_pstdMethods != NULL) {delete m_pstdMethods; m_pstdMethods = NULL;}
00096     m_cychpIndex.clear();
00097     m_cychpMother.clear();
00098     m_cychpFather.clear();
00099     m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.deleteAll();
00100     m_vCNFamilialReporters.deleteAll();
00101 }

00110 /**
00111  * @brief Dump the standard methods to the output stream specified
00112  * @param std::ostream& - The specified output stream
00113  */
00114 void CNFamilialEngine::printStandardMethods(std::ostream &out) {
00115     if (m_pstdMethods == NULL) {return;}
00116     std::map<std::string,std::string>::iterator iter;
00117     out << std::endl << "Standard Methods:" << std::endl;
00118       unsigned int maxLength = 0;
00119       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00120         if(iter->first.size() > maxLength)
00121           maxLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00122       }
00123       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00124         unsigned int currentLength = 0;
00125         out << " '" << iter->first << "' ";
00126         currentLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00127         while(currentLength < maxLength + 1) {
00128             out.put(' ');
00129           currentLength++;
00130         }
00131         out << iter->second << std::endl;
00132       }
00133 }

00135 /**
00136  * @brief Define the options used by this engine
00137  */
00138 void CNFamilialEngine::defineOptions() {
00139 
00140   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00141   defineOption("", "index-cychp-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00142                      "Cychp file specifying the sample to process as the index.",
00143                      "");
00144   defineOption("", "mother-cychp-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00145                      "Cychp file specifying the sample to process as the mother.",
00146                      "");
00147   defineOption("", "father-cychp-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00148                      "Cychp file specifying the sample to process as the father.",
00149                      "");
00150   defineOption("", "allele-frequency-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00151                      "Text file specifying allele frequencies.",
00152                      "");
00153 
00154   defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00155   defineOption("","familial-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00156                      "The file name to output the familial data (in calvin format) to.",
00157                      "");
00158   defineOption("","text-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00159                      "Output data in ASCII text format in addition to calvin format.",
00160                      "true");
00161 
00162   defineOptionSection("Analysis Options");
00163 
00164   defOptMult("a", "analysis", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00165                    "String representing analysis pathway desired.",
00166                    "");
00167 
00168   defineOptionSection("Advanced Options"); 
00169   defineOption("", "xChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "X Chromosome.", "24");
00170   defineOption("", "yChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "Y Chromosome.", "25");
00171 
00172   defineOptionSection("Misc Options");
00173   defineOption("", "explain", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00174                     "Explain a particular operation (i.e. --explain brlmm or --explain brlmm-p).",
00175                     "");
00176 }

00183 /**
00184  * @brief Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00185  */
00186 void CNFamilialEngine::checkOptionsImp() {
00187 
00188   defineStates();
00189 
00190   if(getOpt("explain") != "") { explain(); exit(0); }
00191 
00192   std::string outDir = getOpt("out-dir");
00193   std::vector<std::string> analysis = getOptVector("analysis");
00194 
00195   if (!Fs::fileExists(getOpt("index-cychp-file"))) {
00196     error("Must provide a valid index-cychp-file.");
00197   }
00198 
00199   if ((!Fs::fileExists(getOpt("father-cychp-file"))) && (!Fs::fileExists(getOpt("mother-cychp-file")))) {
00200     error("Must provide a valid father-cychp-file and/or a valid mother-cychp-file.");
00201   }
00202 
00203   if (!Fs::fileExists(getOpt("allele-frequency-file"))) {
00204     error("Must provide a valid allele-frequency-file.");
00205   }
00206 
00207   if (getOpt("familial-file") == "")
00208   {
00209     error("Must provide a familial-file.");
00210   }
00211 
00212   // setup output folder
00213   Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(outDir, false);
00214 
00215   if (getOpt("familial-file") != "") {
00216     if ( !Fs::dirExists(Fs::dirname(getOpt("familial-file"))) ) {
00217       Fs::mkdirPath(Fs::dirname(getOpt("familial-file")), false);
00218     }
00219   }
00220 
00221   createAnalysis();
00222 }
00223 
00224 /**
00225  * @brief Loop over all familial analyses and store calvin group and dataset names needed to run them
00226  */
00227 void CNFamilialEngine::prepareGroupsDatasets()
00228 {
00229     using std::string;
00230     using std::set;
00231 
00232     // Loop over all analyses and store the (set-theoretic) union
00233     // of all cychp groups/datasets required by them. Only those
00234     // groups/datasets will be read in later.
00235     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.size()); iIndex++)
00236     {
00237         const groupDatasets_t groupDatasets = m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->getGroupDatasets();
00238         for (groupDatasets_t::const_iterator gIter = groupDatasets.begin(); gIter != groupDatasets.end(); ++gIter)
00239         {
00240             for (set<string>::const_iterator sIter = gIter->second.begin(); sIter != gIter->second.end(); ++sIter)
00241             {
00242                 m_groupDatasetsAllFamilial[gIter->first].insert(*sIter);
00243             }
00244         }
00245     }
00246 }
00247 
00248 /**
00249  * @brief Run the specifed analysis
00250  */
00251 void CNFamilialEngine::runImp() {
00252   // make this all one big try catch to make sure destructors are
00253   // called if exceptions thrown.
00254   try { // outer try for handling the exception.
00255     try { // inner try for memory clean up.
00256         createAnalysis();
00257         prepareGroupsDatasets();
00258         loadCychpFiles();
00259         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.size()); iIndex++)
00260         {
00261             m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->run();
00262             Verbose::out(1, "*");
00263         }
00264         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNFamilialReporters.size()); iIndex++)
00265         {
00266             m_vCNFamilialReporters[iIndex]->setup(*this, m_cychpIndex, m_cychpMother, m_cychpFather, m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods);
00267             m_vCNFamilialReporters[iIndex]->run();
00268             Verbose::out(1, "*");
00269         }
00270     } // inner try end
00271     catch (...) {
00272       // Free up any allocated memory here...
00273         clear();
00274       // re-throw the unchanged exception.
00275       throw;
00276     }
00277   } // outer try end
00278   /* When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. */
00279   catch(Except &e) {
00280     Verbose::out(0,"");
00281     error("Exception caught. "
00282                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00283   }
00284   catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
00285     Verbose::out(0,"");
00286     error("std::bad_alloc caught. "
00287                   "The application has run out of memory. "
00288                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00289   }
00290   catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00291     Verbose::out(0,"");
00292     error("affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException caught. "
00293                    "Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
00294                   "Message is: " + affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()));
00295   }
00296   catch(BroadException &e) {
00297     Verbose::out(0,"");
00298     error("BroadException caught. "
00299                   "Message is: '" + ToStr(e.m_msg) + "' source file: '" + ToStr(e.m_sourcefile) +
00300                   ":" + ToStr(e.m_sourceline) + "'");
00301   }
00302   catch(const std::exception &e) {
00303     Verbose::out(0,"");
00304     error("std::exception caught. "
00305                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00306   }
00307   catch(const BaseException &e) {
00308     Verbose::out(0,"");
00309     error("newmat BaseException caught. "
00310                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00311   }
00312   catch(...) {
00313     Verbose::out(0,"");
00314     error("Unknown exception caught. "
00315                   "No message is available.");
00316   }
00317   // free any allocated memory here...
00318   clear();
00319 }

00321 /**
00322  * @brief Create the specified analysis
00323  */
00324 void CNFamilialEngine::createAnalysis()
00325 {
00326     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialEngine::createAnalysis()");
00327     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00328     std::vector<std::string>& analysis = getOptVector("analysis");
00329     if (analysis.empty())
00330     {
00331         analysis.push_back("paternity");
00332         //analysis.push_back("segment-overlap");
00333         //analysis.push_back("genotype-concordance");
00334         //analysis.push_back("genotype-discordance");
00335         //analysis.push_back("cn-neutral-loh-concordance");
00336         //analysis.push_back("cn-loss-loh-concordance");
00337         //analysis.push_back("hetero-upd");
00338         //analysis.push_back("iso-upd");
00339         //analysis.push_back("denovo-cn");
00340         //analysis.push_back("hemizygous-parent-of-origin");
00341     }
00342     CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::getParams().clear();
00343     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodFactory factory;
00344     m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.deleteAll();
00345     m_vCNFamilialReporters.deleteAll();
00346     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < analysis.size(); i++)
00347     {
00348         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = NULL;
00349         if (analysis[i] == "") {throw(Except("Invalid (blank) analysis specification"));}
00350         Verbose::out(1, analysis[i]);
00351         pMethod = factory.CNFamilialAnalysisMethodForString(analysis[i]);
00352         pMethod->setup(m_cychpIndex, m_cychpMother, m_cychpFather, getOpt("allele-frequency-file"));
00353         m_vCNFamilialAnalysisMethods.push_back(pMethod);
00354     }
00355     if (getOpt("familial-file") != "")
00356     {
00357         CNFamilialReporter* pReporter = NULL;
00358         pReporter = factory.CNFamilialReporterForString("familial-output");
00359         m_vCNFamilialReporters.push_back(pReporter);
00360     }
00361 }
00362 
00363 /**
00364  * @brief Load up the data from the cychp files into memory.
00365  */
00366 void CNFamilialEngine::loadCychpFiles()
00367 {
00368     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00369     // load index
00370     AffxString strIndexCychpFileName = getOpt("index-cychp-file");
00371     if (!m_cychpIndex.readFile(strIndexCychpFileName, m_groupDatasetsAllFamilial, "index", "index-cychp-file")) {error("Cannot read cychp file: " + strIndexCychpFileName);}
00372     int iMarkerCount = m_cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount();
00373     if (iMarkerCount == 0) {error("No entries found in the index-cychp-file for the ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set.");}
00374 
00375     // load mother
00376     AffxString strMotherCychpFileName = getOpt("mother-cychp-file");
00377     if (strMotherCychpFileName != "")
00378     {
00379         if (!m_cychpMother.readFile(strMotherCychpFileName, m_groupDatasetsAllFamilial, "mother", "mother-cychp-file")) {error("Cannot read cychp file: " + strMotherCychpFileName);}
00380         if (m_cychpMother.getCychpHeader().getGender() != affx::Female) {
00381             error("The mother-cychp-file does not contain female gender data");
00382         }
00383         if (m_cychpMother.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount() != iMarkerCount)
00384         {
00385             error("The number of entries in the mother-cychp-file ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set does not equal the number of entries in the index-cychp-file ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set.");
00386         }
00387     }
00388 
00389     // load father
00390     AffxString strFatherCychpFileName = getOpt("father-cychp-file");
00391     if (strFatherCychpFileName != "")
00392     {
00393         if (!m_cychpFather.readFile(strFatherCychpFileName, m_groupDatasetsAllFamilial, "father", "father-cychp-file")) {error("Cannot read cychp file: " + strFatherCychpFileName);}
00394         if (m_cychpFather.getCychpHeader().getGender() != affx::Male) {
00395             error("The father-cychp-file does not contain male gender data");
00396         }
00397         if (m_cychpFather.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount() != iMarkerCount)
00398         {
00399             error("The number of entries in the father-cychp-file ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set does not equal the number of entries in the index-cychp-file ProbeSets\\CopyNumber data set.");
00400         }
00401     }
00402     checkFamilialConsistency();
00403     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00404 }
00405 
00406 // Make sure the cychp trio use the same CN reference and annotation file
00407 void CNFamilialEngine::checkFamilialConsistency()
00408 {
00409     if (getOpt("mother-cychp-file") != "") {
00410         checkFamilialConsistencyPair(m_cychpIndex, m_cychpMother);
00411     }
00412     if (getOpt("father-cychp-file") != "") {
00413         checkFamilialConsistencyPair(m_cychpIndex, m_cychpFather);
00414     }
00415 }
00416 
00417 void CNFamilialEngine::checkFamilialConsistencyPair(CNCychp& cychp1, CNCychp& cychp2)
00418 {
00419     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName())
00420     {
00421         error("CN reference files mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00422               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists CN reference '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName()) + "', "
00423               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists CN reference '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName()) + "'");
00424     }
00425     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getAnnotationFileName() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getAnnotationFileName())
00426     {
00427         error("Annotation files mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00428               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists annotation file '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getAnnotationFileName()) + "', "
00429               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists annotation file '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getAnnotationFileName()) + "'");
00430     }
00431     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getArrayType() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getArrayType())
00432     {
00433         error("Array type mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00434               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists array type '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getArrayType()) + "', "
00435               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists array type '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getArrayType()) + "'");
00436     }
00437     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpDate() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpDate())
00438     {
00439         error("dbsnp date mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00440               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpDate()) + "', "
00441               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpDate()) + "'");
00442     }
00443     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpVersion() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpVersion())
00444     {
00445         error("dbsnp version mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00446               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpVersion()) + "', "
00447               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getDbsnpVersion()) + "'");
00448     }
00449     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxAnnotDate() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxAnnotDate())
00450     {
00451         error("Netaffx annotation date mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00452               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxAnnotDate()) + "', "
00453               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxAnnotDate()) + "'");
00454     }
00455     if (cychp1.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxBuild() != cychp2.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxBuild())
00456     {
00457         error("Netaffx build number mismatch in CYCHP files. "
00458               "File '" + ToStr(cychp1.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp1.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxBuild()) + "', "
00459               "File '" + ToStr(cychp2.getFileName()) + "' lists dbsnp date '" + ToStr(cychp2.getCychpHeader().getNetaffxBuild()) + "'");
00460     }
00461 }

00463 
00464 void CNFamilialEngine::explain() {
00465     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodFactory factory;
00466     std::vector<SelfDoc>docs = factory.getDocs();
00467 
00468     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < docs.size(); i++)
00469     {
00470         if(docs[i].getDocName() == getOpt("explain"))
00471         {
00472             SelfDoc::printExplanation(docs[i],cout);
00473         }
00474     }
00475     docs.clear();
00476 }
00477 
00478 void CNFamilialEngine::extraHelp() {
00479     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodFactory factory;
00480     printStandardMethods(cout);
00481     EngineUtil::printSelfDocs("Data transformations:", factory.getDocs());
00482 }
